DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , observational , multicenter study woman surgically-correctable stress urinary incontinence undergo TOT-sling operative procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Urethral Length TOT ( Transobturator Tape ) Positioning
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , observational , multicenter study woman surgically-correctable stress urinary incontinence undergo TOT-sling operative procedure . Data collect preoperative urogynecological test medical history . Outcome data collect 1-3 day 6 month procedure .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient objective demonstrable sign stress urinary incontinence ( SUI ) , include patient intrinsic sphincter deficiency ( ISD ) . Objective test include : standing stress test , urodynamics evaluation , pad test . 2 . Patient age 18 old . 3 . Patient agree participate study , include completion studyrelated procedure evaluation , document agreement sign Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) /Ethic commission ( EC ) approve informed consent . 4 . Patient able fill questionnaire ( judgement investigator ) 1 . Patient associate suspected neurological disease . 2 . Patient active lesion present injury perineum urethra . 3 . Patient urethral obstruction . 4 . Patient significant pelvic organ prolapse ( Grade III/IV ) require surgical treatment . 5 . Patient currently urinary tract infection .
